short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-extract website content for Claude. Paste URLs and instantly share complete webpages with claude.ai - no copying needed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ WHAT IS THIS?
Website Reader for Claude makes sharing web content in your conversations effortless. Instead of copying and pasting text or taking screenshots, simply paste a URL into your message. The extension automatically extracts the webpage content (using Jina.ai Reader) and attaches it to your message, allowing Claude to understand and discuss the entire webpage.

🌟 KEY FEATURES:

⚡️ Instant Content Sharing
• Just paste any URL into your conversation
• Website content is automatically extracted and attached
• No manual copying or formatting needed

📝 Perfect Formatting
• Clean, well-structured content extraction
• Preserves important formatting and hierarchy
• Ensures Claude understands the content perfectly

🚀 Simple & Fast
• Works automatically when you paste URLs
• No configuration needed
• Zero extra steps required

🔒 Privacy Focused
• Secure content processing
• No data storage
• No tracking or analytics

🔄 HOW IT WORKS:
1. Paste any URL in your Claude conversation
2. Website content is automatically extracted (with Jina.ai Reader)
3. Content is attached to your message
4. Claude can now understand and discuss the webpage

⚠️ Note: This extension works exclusively on claude.ai

⚡️ Powered by Jina.ai Reader
✨ Sponsored by MailWizard (https://mailwizard.ai)

GitHub: https://github.com/sgasser/website-reader-for-claude
